dmca.title: Abuse Report - Notice of Intellectual Property Violations and Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Rich Jerk [mailto:info@therichjerk.com] 
Sent: Saturday, February 11, 2006 12:05 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Cc: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: Abuse Report - Notice of Intellectual Property Violations and
Copyright Infringement


To Whom It May Concern,
 
This email is a formal notice of our intent to file a copyright infringement
suit against one of your current customers, in accordance with the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA):
 
Theplanet.com Internet Services Inc
 
At their website http://www.superrichjerk.com/ (IP Address: 70.84.86.68),
your customer is blatantly selling illegal copies of our copyrighted ebook,
stolen from our website www.therichjerk.com, for which we have multiple
copyrights filed with the U.S. Copyright Office, for images and text.
 
In order to protect yourself from any legal action as well, your cooperation
in disallowing this criminal activity is required.
 
For the record, we hereby state that we have a good faith belief that use of
the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent, or the law. 
 
We also formally state that the information in this notification is
accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the Complaining Party is the
owner, or is authorized to act on behalf of the owner, of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed. 
 
Please govern yourself accordingly.
 
Kelly Felix
CreditPro, Inc.
1925 Palomar Oaks Way, Ste 207
Carlsbad, CA 92008
Ph: (760) 476-1650
Fx: (760) 476-3794
http://www.therichjerk.com
bcc: TC Johnston, Esq.
